metadata.title: CVE-2014-0216 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The My Home implementation in the block_html_pluginfile function inblocks/html/lib.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.10, 2.5.xbefore 2.5.6, and 2.6.x before 2.6.3 does not properly restrict fileaccess, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information byvisiting an HTML block.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
